column2: June 22]], [[1932]]) is an English actress, best known for the role of [[wikipedia:Sybil Fawlty
column3: Sybil Fawlty]] in ''Fawlty Towers'', and she also served as storyteller for ''[[Jackanory]]''. In [[1956]], she played [[Ioreth]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)
column4: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (1955 radio series)]].
